name: Foundation
description: The cornerstone of your business structure, encompassing core systems, governance, and fundamental processes that support all operations. This includes legal framework, compliance systems, financial infrastructure, and organizational governance.

subComponents.name: Legal & Compliance
subComponents.description: Corporate structure, regulatory compliance, and legal framework management

subComponents.name: Financial Infrastructure
subComponents.description: Accounting systems, financial controls, and reporting mechanisms

subComponents.name: Governance Systems
subComponents.description: Board oversight, policy management, and organizational controls

subComponents.name: Technology Platform
subComponents.description: Core IT infrastructure, security systems, and data management

name: Operations
description: Active business processes, day-to-day activities, and operational workflows that generate value and drive business outcomes. This encompasses production, service delivery, customer relations, and ongoing business activities.

subComponents.name: Sales & Marketing
subComponents.description: Customer acquisition, brand management, and market development activities

subComponents.name: Service Delivery
subComponents.description: Product development, service fulfillment, and customer support operations

subComponents.name: Supply Chain
subComponents.description: Vendor management, procurement, and logistics coordination

subComponents.name: Human Resources
subComponents.description: Talent management, organizational development, and workforce operations

name: Holdings
description: Strategic assets, investments, and long-term value stores that comprise your business portfolio. This includes real estate, financial investments, intellectual property, and other valuable assets that appreciate over time.

subComponents.name: Real Estate Portfolio
subComponents.description: Commercial and residential properties, land holdings, and real estate investments

subComponents.name: Financial Investments
subComponents.description: Stocks, bonds, mutual funds, and other financial instruments

subComponents.name: Intellectual Property
subComponents.description: Patents, trademarks, copyrights, and proprietary technologies

subComponents.name: Strategic Partnerships
subComponents.description: Joint ventures, strategic alliances, and collaborative investments
